configurable.i18n_name: THE CROPPED SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION MIAMI BLUE DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_name_de: THE CROPPED SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION MIAMI BLUE DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_name_nl: THE CROPPED SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION MIAMI BLUE DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_name_fr: THE CROPPED SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION MIAMI BLUE DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_name_it: THE CROPPED SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION MIAMI BLUE DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_name_es: THE CROPPED SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION MIAMI BLUE DISTRESSED
configurable.i18n_description: The Cropped Skinny in A very expensive brand’s slim illusion is the definitive skinny fit jean. This second skin fit is the shorter version of our regular skinny, meant to hit just above the ankle to show off your shoes. These skinny fit women’s jeans in a beautiful 70's inspired Miami blue are an essential modern classic with a slimming fit that molds and moves with you.
configurable.i18n_description_de: The Cropped Skinny in A very expensive brand’s slim illusion is the definitive skinny fit jean. This second skin fit is the shorter version of our regular skinny, meant to hit just above the ankle to show off your shoes. These skinny fit women’s jeans in a beautiful 70's inspired Miami blue are an essential modern classic with a slimming fit that molds and moves with you.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: De Cropped Skinny in A very expensive brand's Slim Illusion denim is een echte skinny fit jeans. Dit model dat als een tweede huid omhult is de kortere versie van onze normale skinny en valt net boven de enkel zodat je met je schoenen kunt pronken. Deze prachtige jaren 70 geïnspireerde Miami Blue vrouwenjeans is een essentiële moderne klassieker met een afkledende pasvorm die zich perfect aan het lichaam aanpast.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Ce Cropped Skinny en denim Slim Illusion de A very expensive brand est LE skinny ultime. Cette coupe seconde peau est la version courte de notre skinny classique, s'arrêtant juste au-dessus de la cheville pour laisser voir vos chaussures. Ce skinny femme à la belle teinte seventies Miami Blue est un basique tendance incontournable, sa coupe slim suit les mouvements du corps en beauté.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Il Cropped Skinny realizzato con il tessuto slim illusion di A very expensive brand è il jeans skinny per eccellenza. Effetto seconda pelle, è la versione più corta del nostro skinny regular, e si ferma appena sopra la caviglia per dare il giusto risalto anche alla scarpa. Questo skinny da donna declinato nel blu Miami ispirato agli anni ’70 è un classico moderno ed essenziale, con un fit che snellisce la figura e asseconda ogni movimento.
configurable.i18n_description_es: El Cropped Skinny, hecho con el tejido slim illusion de A very expensive brand, es el vaquero skinny por excelencia. Este pantalón calza como una segunda piel, es la versión más corta de nuestro skinny regular y queda justo sobre el tobillo para que también luzcas tus zapatos. Este skinny femenino en color azul Miami se inspira en los 70 y es un clásico moderno esencial, con un calce que modela la figura y sigue tus movimientos.

configurable.i18n_product_details:
• Measurements based on Size 27
  • Approx. inseam: 28in
  • Rise: Front: 6 3/4in
  • Leg opening: 11in
  • Measurements may vary based on size, fabric and wash
  • 92% Cotton 6% Elastomultiester 2% Elastane


  • Machine wash, max 30° C, max agitation
  • Do not use Chlorine-based bleach
  • Do not thumble dry
  • Cool Iron (max 110°C)
  • Suitable for dry cleaning
configurable.i18n_product_details_de:
• Maße basieren auf Größe 27
  • Beinlänge ca. 71 cm
  • Leibhöhe: Vorne: 17 cm
  • Fussweite: 28 cm
  • Die Maße können je nach Größe, Material und Waschung variieren
  • 92% Baumwolle 6% Elastomultiester 2% Elastane


  • Maschinenwäsche bei max. 30°C. Hoher Schleudergang.
  • Keine Chlorbleiche verwenden
  • Nicht trocknergeeignet
  • Auf niedrigster Stufe bügeln (max. 110°C)
  • Geeignet für chemische Reinigung
configurable.i18n_product_details_nl:
• Afmetingen gebaseerd op maat 27
  • Binnenbeenlengte ca. 71 cm
  • Kruisnaad: Voor: 17 cm
  • Zoomwijdte: 28 cm
  • Afmetingen kunnen variëren op basis van maat, stof en wassing
  • 92% Katoen 6% Elastomultiester 2% Elastane


  • Machine wassen, max. 30°C, max. toerental
  • Gebruik geen bleekmiddel op chloorbasis
  • Niet trommeldrogen
  • Koud strijken (max. 110°C)
  • Chemisch reinigen mogelijk
configurable.i18n_product_details_fr:
• Mesures sur la base de la taille 27
  • Inseam: sur 71 cm
  • Fourche: Avant: 17 cm
  • Ouverture des jambes: 28 cm
  • Les mesures peuvent varier en fonction de la taille, du tissu et du lavage
  • 92% Coton 6% Élastomultiester 2% Elastane


  • Laver en machine, 30°C maximum, essorage rapide
  • Ne pas utiliser d’eau de javel ou d’autre produit à base de chlore
  • Sèche-linge interdit
  • Repassage basse température (110°C maximum)
  • Nettoyage à sec possible
configurable.i18n_product_details_it:
• Misure basate sulla taglia 27
  • Lunghezza dal cavallo alla caviglia: circa 71 cm
  • Lunghezza dal cavallo alla vita: Davanti: 17 cm
  • Apertura gamba: 28 cm
  • Le misure possono variare in base alla taglia, al tessuto e al lavaggio
  • 92% Cotone 6% Elastomultiestere 2% Elastane


  • Lavare in lavatrice, max 30°C, centrifuga alta
  • Non candeggiare con prodotti a base di cloro
  • Non asciugare in asciugatrice
  • Stirare a bassa temperatura (max 110°C)
  • Può essere lavato a secco
configurable.i18n_product_details_es:
• Medidas basadas en la Talla 27
  • Tiro aproximado: 71 cm
  • Tiro: Frontal: 17 cm
  • Abertura de la pierna: 28 cm
  • Las medidas pueden variar dependiendo de la talla, material y teñido
  • 92% Algodón 6% Elastomultiéster 2% Elastane


  • Lavado a máquina, temperatura máx. 30°, agitación intensa
  • No usar blanqueador a base de cloro
  • No secar en secadora
  • Planchado en frío (máx. 110°C)
  • Admite limpieza en seco
